attributes.action: Cap the rate of profit energy companies make
attributes.additional_details: It's not even once a year the 'Big Six' put up their enery prices, it;s twice! At least they have just said prices will not rise again this winter, no instead they will probably double in spring instead. Join me in asking the goverment to CAP the ammount of profit the energy companies can make in a year and stop stealing from our pockets.
